content.rendered: RoA Trading (previously Misale W/Sillasie General Trading) is a private company engaged in import/export, Wholesale & Retail, Real estate Business Services For Small to Large-scale Enterprises and Banks. Founded on an Ambitious Vision, the company is constructing a multipurpose building and the client wanted to take this opportunity to rebrand the company to the legacy he realized, The name of his late Mother Roman Assfaw shortened to RoA. I was asked to develop a logo mark that expresses the story while being flexible to accommodate the new structure of the company, RoA Trading, and RoA Multiplex.
